query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Sì tosto come l’ultima parola 2 la benedetta fiamma per dir tolse, 3 a rotar cominciò la santa mola;
query.error: **English:** 1 As soon as the last word 2 the blessed flame uttered to say this, 3 the holy millstone began to rotate;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 e nel suo giro tutta non si volse 5 prima ch’un’altra di cerchio la chiuse, 6 e moto a moto e canto a canto colse;
query.error: **English:** 4 and in its rotation it did not complete a full turn 5 before another circle enclosed it, 6 and movement by movement and song by song it gathered;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 canto che tanto vince nostre muse, 8 nostre serene in quelle dolci tube, 9 quanto primo splendor quel ch’e’ refuse.
query.error: **English:** 7 a song that so surpasses our muses, 8 our sirens in those sweet pipes, 9 as the first splendor surpasses that which it rejects.
query.result: 7 nyanyian yang begitu melampaui renungan kita, 8 para putri duyung kita dalam seruling yang merdu itu, 9 sebagaimana kemegahan pertama melampaui apa yang ditolaknya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Come si volgon per tenera nube 11 due archi paralelli e concolori, 12 quando Iunone a sua ancella iube,
query.error: **English:** 10 As two bows, parallel and of like colors, 11 are turned in the sky by a tender cloud, 12 when Juno commands her handmaid,
query.result: 10 Seperti dua busur, sejajar dan berwarna sama, 11 yang dibentuk di langit oleh awan yang lembut, 12 ketika Juno memerintahkan pelayannya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 nascendo di quel d’entro quel di fori, 14 a guisa del parlar di quella vaga 15 ch’amor consunse come sol vapori,
query.error: **English:** 13 the one born from the one within, 14 in the manner of the speech of that fair one 15 whom love consumed like the sun consumes vapors,
query.result: 13 yang satu lahir dari yang di dalam, 14 dengan cara bicara wanita cantik itu 15 yang cintanya membakar seperti matahari membakar uap,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 e fanno qui la gente esser presaga, 17 per lo patto che Dio con Noè puose, 18 del mondo che già mai più non s’allaga:
query.error: **English:** 16 and they make people here prescient, 17 because of the pact that God made with Noah, 18 that the world will never again be flooded:
query.result: 16 dan mereka membuat orang-orang di sini menjadi waspada, 17 karena perjanjian yang Tuhan buat dengan Nuh, 18 bahwa dunia tidak akan pernah lagi dilanda banjir:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 così di quelle sempiterne rose 20 volgiensi circa noi le due ghirlande, 21 e sì l’estrema a l’intima rispuose.
query.error: **English:** 19 so did the two garlands of those eternal roses 20 turn around us, 21 and so did the outermost answer the innermost.
query.result: 19 begitulah dua karangan bunga mawar abadi itu 20 berputar di sekitar kita, 21 dan yang terluar pun menjawab yang terdalam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 22 After the jubilation and the other great feast, 23 both of singing and of flaming, 24 light with light, joyful and gentle,
query.result: 22 Setelah kegembiraan dan pesta besar lainnya, 23 baik nyanyian maupun nyala api, 24 cahaya dengan cahaya, gembira dan lembut,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 insieme a punto e a voler quetarsi, 26 pur come li occhi ch’al piacer che i move 27 conviene insieme chiudere e levarsi;
query.error: **English:** 25 together at the point and willing to be quiet, 26 just like the eyes that, to the pleasure that moves them, 27 must close and open together;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 del cor de l’una de le luci nove 29 si mosse voce, che l’ago a la stella 30 parer mi fece in volgermi al suo dove;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 e cominciò: «L’amor che mi fa bella 32 mi tragge a ragionar de l’altro duca 33 per cui del mio sì ben ci si favella.
query.error: **English:** 31 and it began: "The love that makes me beautiful 32 draws me to speak of the other leader 33 through whom my name is spoken of so well.
query.result: 31 dan itu dimulai: "Cinta yang membuatku cantik 32 menarikku untuk berbicara tentang pemimpin lainnya 33 yang melaluinya namaku diucapkan dengan sangat baik.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Degno è che, dov’ è l’un, l’altro s’induca: 35 sì che, com’ elli ad una militaro, 36 così la gloria loro insieme luca.
query.error: **English:** 34 It is fitting that where one is, the other should be induced: 35 so that, just as he shines in a military [context], 36 so their glory may shine together.
query.result: 34 Layaklah bahwa, di mana yang satu berada, yang lain harus dibujuk: 35 sehingga, sebagaimana ia bersinar dalam [konteks] militer, 36 maka kemuliaan mereka bersinar bersama.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
